attributes.action: KEEP THE POPPIES AT THECTOWER OF LONDON FOREVER
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this e-petition to keep the The Poppies at Tower of London FOREVER. And God forbid we have another fallen hero we lay another Poppie to rember them. This is a great cause and we need to rember our fallen heroes forever. I have a Facebook page that needs as many "likes" as possible as well. Please take a look and sign both.
Thanks for reading.
https://m.facebook.com/keepthepoppiesgoing
